Definition: Spicy chicken wings coated in a tangy, hot sauce, typically served with celery and blue cheese or ranch dressing.
Breaded and fried mozzarella cheese, served with marinara sauce for dipping.
Tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapeños, and often meats, beans, or salsa, served with sour cream and guacamole.
Hard-boiled eggs halved, with yolks mixed with mayonnaise, mustard, and spices, then piped back into the whites.
Creamy dip made with spinach, artichoke hearts, cream cheese, and parmesan, served warm with chips or bread.
Toasted bread topped with a mixture of diced tomatoes, garlic, basil, and olive oil.
Fried squid rings, lightly breaded, served with marinara sauce or lemon aioli.
Flour tortilla filled with shredded chicken, cheese, and spices, grilled and served with salsa and sour cream.
Chilled shrimp served with a tangy cocktail sauce made from ketchup, horseradish, and lemon.
Mushroom caps filled with a mixture of breadcrumbs, cheese, garlic, and herbs, then baked.
Hollowed potato halves topped with melted cheese, bacon, and green onions, served with sour cream.
Sliced onions dipped in batter or breadcrumbs and deep-fried, often served with ketchup or ranch.
Mashed avocado mixed with lime, cilantro, onion, and tomato, served with tortilla chips.
Mini sausages wrapped in puff pastry or crescent roll dough and baked until golden.
Jalapeño peppers stuffed with cream cheese or cheddar, breaded, and fried.
Creamy chickpea dip flavored with tahini, lemon, and garlic, served with soft pita bread.
Patties made from crab meat, breadcrumbs, and seasonings, pan-fried and served with remoulade sauce.
Mini burgers with beef patties, cheese, and toppings like lettuce and tomato, served on small buns.
Breaded and fried chicken strips, served with dipping sauces like honey mustard or barbecue.
Pickle slices battered and fried, served with ranch or spicy dipping sauce.
Assorted cheeses like cheddar, brie, and gouda, served with crackers, grapes, and nuts.
Small balls of ground meat, often beef or pork, simmered in tomato sauce or served with a glaze.
Baked clams topped with breadcrumbs, bacon, and a buttery herb mixture.
Raw, diced tuna mixed with soy sauce, sesame oil, and spices, served with wonton chips.
Sliced green tomatoes coated in cornmeal or flour and fried, often served with remoulade.
Bite-sized skewers with olives, mozzarella, salami, and cherry tomatoes, drizzled with balsamic.
Sea scallops wrapped in bacon, grilled or baked, and served with a glaze or lemon.
Sliced tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil, drizzled with olive oil and balsamic reduction.
Crispy, fried rolls filled with cabbage, pork, or shrimp, served with sweet and sour sauce.
Raw fish or shrimp marinated in lime juice with onions, cilantro, and peppers, served chilled.
Soft, bite-sized pretzels served with warm cheese sauce or mustard.
Balls of macaroni and cheese, breaded and fried, served with marinara or ranch.
Crispy, fried potato nuggets, often served with ketchup or cheese sauce.
Mini bell peppers filled with cream cheese, sausage, or spiced rice, then baked.
Brie cheese baked until gooey, often topped with jam or nuts, served with crackers.
Lightly battered and fried shrimp, served with soy sauce or sweet chili dip.
Grilled chicken skewers marinated in peanut sauce, served with extra sauce for dipping.
Small pastry crusts filled with egg, cheese, and fillings like spinach or bacon, baked until set.
Tortilla chips paired with a fresh tomato-based salsa with onions, cilantro, and lime.
Sliced bread topped with garlic butter and herbs, toasted until crispy.
Cucumber slices topped with cream cheese, dill, and smoked salmon or cherry tomatoes.
Zucchini slices battered and fried, served with marinara or ranch dressing.
Small corn tortillas rolled with beef or chicken, fried, and served with salsa or guacamole.
Creamy spread of cheddar, pimentos, and mayonnaise, served with crackers or celery.
Dates stuffed with cheese or almonds, wrapped in bacon, and baked until crispy.
French fries topped with chili and melted cheese, often garnished with onions.
Bite-sized balls of sausage, cheese, and biscuit mix, baked until golden.
Small toasts topped with mashed avocado, tomato, and seasonings like red pepper flakes.
Tiny tortillas filled with seasoned beef, chicken, or fish, topped with lettuce and cheese.
Crispy fried sweet potato sticks, served with a dipping sauce like honey mustard.
